thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au | 2 of 409
thread.title: Tony McMahon
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Tony McMahon

author: Tony McMahon
title: Tony McMahon
text: I was having problems (and still am) getting my Yamaha MG mixer to "talk" to my Mac, the sales person spent some time suggesting what the problem might have been but as with all computer based products the answer to problems is never simple. I intend to go back to the store to enquire further about resolving the issues. The problems I am having are in no way Store DJ's fault and it will be interesting to see how far they will go to sort out the issues I'm having. P.S. I have spent about $1000 so far with them.
